LESSON.HEADINGS: <1>Let's start with the J,M,I and the comma keys.</1> <2>Now, move on to the I and , keys.</2> <3>Next, try the O, period, p and / keys.</3> <4>Ok, on to the P and / keys.</4> <5>Great work! On to the Y and N.</5> <6>Swell! Now let's practice all these.</6> <7>Just two more to go!</7> <8>Now combine it with the last lesson!</8>
LESSON.DESCRIPTION: The fourth lesson lets you start trying some of the diagonal keys on the right hand. Keep your left hand on "ASDF" and right on "JKL;".
